mapper.select: select b.no no ,b.title title ,u.name name ,b.hit hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') day from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no order by b.no desc
select b.no ,b.title title ,u.name ,b.hit hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') day ,b.content from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
